医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究为减少感染艾滋病毒的孕妇疟疾带来了希望根据 MA​​MAH 的最终结果，对于感染艾滋病毒的女性来说，使用 DHA-PPQ 进行预防性治疗是预防怀孕期间疟疾的一种安全有效的策略。MAMAH 是一项由欧洲和发展中国家临床试验伙伴关系 (EDCTP) 资助并协调的临床试验。由巴塞罗那全球健康研究所 (ISGlobal) 负责，该机构由“la Caixa”基金会支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/New-study-offers-hope-for-reducing-malaria-in-pregnant-women-living-with-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/New-study-offers-hope-for-reducing-malaria-in-pregnant-women-living-with-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=570ec249-5008-4966-ba93-66bb22fd5632 Fri, 12 Jan 2024 23:15:42 -0500 New study offers hope for reducing malaria in pregnant women living with HIV
瑞典献血者研究显示未确诊 TBE 感染的患病率很高卫生服务部门未检测到的蜱传 TBE 病毒感染人数远远高于之前的假设。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Swedish-blood-donor-study-reveals-high-prevalence-of-undiagnosed-TBE-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Swedish-blood-donor-study-reveals-high-prevalence-of-undiagnosed-TBE-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=416e5f9a-9faf-4b04-a58e-9e0d1d2d57a1 Fri, 12 Jan 2024 23:09:30 -0500 Swedish blood donor study reveals high prevalence of undiagnosed TBE infections
RBM5 被确定为急性髓系白血病 HOXA9 的关键调节因子HOXA9 蛋白在大多数急性髓系白血病 (AML) 病例中过度表达，并与患者预后不良相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/RBM5-identified-as-key-regulator-of-HOXA9-in-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/RBM5-identified-as-key-regulator-of-HOXA9-in-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d68a85e9-703a-42fb-a912-b06ecd22d824 Fri, 12 Jan 2024 23:00:51 -0500 RBM5 identified as key regulator of HOXA9 in acute myeloid leukemia
研究发现 FDA 批准的药物可能有助于减轻手术后疼痛南卡罗来纳医科大学 (MUSC) 麻醉和围手术期医学系的研究人员发现 FDA 批准的药物可能有助于减轻手术后的疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/FDA-approved-drug-may-help-to-decrease-pain-after-surgery-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/FDA-approved-drug-may-help-to-decrease-pain-after-surgery-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4923ddee-8124-4ab0-a3f7-3db744db3f2c Fri, 12 Jan 2024 22:52:15 -0500 FDA-approved drug may help to decrease pain after surgery, study finds
肯塔基大学女性健康心脏项目十年来致力于防治心脏病肯塔基大学将举办一年一度的女性健康心脏研讨会，以纪念提高认识并继续努力警告女性心脏病危险的十年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/10-years-of-University-of-Kentuckys-Healthy-Hearts-for-Women-takes-aim-at-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/10-years-of-University-of-Kentuckys-Healthy-Hearts-for-Women-takes-aim-at-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c632b578-3abb-4e78-b8c6-805f7d7b73f7 Fri, 12 Jan 2024 22:02:11 -0500 10 years of University of Kentucky's Healthy Hearts for Women takes aim at heart disease
帕唑帕尼在 EWSR1-NFATC2 骨肉瘤中的活性得到证实2023 年 9 月 20 日，Oncoscience（第 10 卷）发表了一份新病例报告，题为“帕唑帕尼在 EWSR1-NFATC2 易位相关骨肉瘤中的活性”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Pazopanib-activity-confirmed-in-EWSR1-NFATC2-bone-sarcoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Pazopanib-activity-confirmed-in-EWSR1-NFATC2-bone-sarcoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea6a18cf-dc0f-45f8-8882-30b5d7456cd3 Fri, 12 Jan 2024 21:57:43 -0500 Pazopanib activity confirmed in EWSR1-NFATC2 bone sarcoma
社区卫生工作者倡导少数族裔的遗传素养DNA 的变化（称为突变）会增加患癌症的可能性。具体来说，BRCA 1 和 2 基因突变的人患遗传性乳腺癌和卵巢癌的可能性要大得多。但人们如何知道自己是否有这些突变呢？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Community-health-workers-champion-genic-literacy-for-minorities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Community-health-workers-champion-genic-literacy-for-minorities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb2f8396-5b84-4951-aaf4-2e01e74de89a Fri, 12 Jan 2024 21:53:15 -0500 Community health workers champion genetic literacy for minorities
用于高通量动脉粥样硬化药物测试的 3D 纳米基质血管片模型阿拉巴马大学伯明翰分校的研究人员在《生物材料》杂志上报告说，一种突破性的 3D、三层纳米基质血管片具有动脉粥样硬化的多种特征，已用于开发治疗这种疾病的候选药物的高通量功能测定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/3D-nanomatrix-angio-sheet-model-for-high-throughput-atherosclerosis-drug-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/3D-nanomatrix-angio-sheet-model-for-high-throughput-atherosclerosis-drug-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b504116d-ccce-46e6-ab98-dda3abb4a67d Fri, 12 Jan 2024 21:40:27 -0500 3D nanomatrix vascular sheet model for high-throughput atherosclerosis drug testing
尿失禁与未来残疾的较高几率相关新研究表明，如果您是 30% 至 50% 患有尿失禁的女性之一，那么这可能会变成一个更大的健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Urinary-incontinence-linked-with-higher-odds-of-future-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Urinary-incontinence-linked-with-higher-odds-of-future-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=870db52a-1282-48dd-9921-74b1f7ec19c5 Fri, 12 Jan 2024 20:48:45 -0500 Urinary incontinence associated with higher odds of future disability
欲望的生物学特征有助于解释配对键的选择性性质跳上车去见你的爱人，共进晚餐，享受大量的多巴胺——；与对糖、尼古丁和可卡因的渴望相同的激素——；可能会注入您大脑的奖励中心，激励您勇敢地面对交通，以保持这种独特的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/A-biological-signature-of-desire-helps-explain-the-selective-nature-of-pair-bonds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/A-biological-signature-of-desire-helps-explain-the-selective-nature-of-pair-bonds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=344331bf-14e9-47d3-8a31-2bbf36cc046e Fri, 12 Jan 2024 20:45:43 -0500 A biological signature of desire helps explain the selective nature of pair bonds
